attributes.action: voluntary use of SODIUM PENTATHOL in trials and by politicians in media sessions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: SODIUM PENTATHOL HAS BEEN USED BY GOVERNMENTS IN INTERROGATIONS IN WARTIME ETC, AND FOUND TO GIVE ACCURATE TRUTHFUL REPLIES. COULD WE HAVE A REFERENDUM ON ITS USE IN TRIALS AND VOLUNTARILY IN MEDIA DEBATES BY POLITICIANS.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
